column4: I am trying to install Cinelerra on Ubuntu 9.0 - anyone here managed to do that?
9.04 that is
the Cinelerra app does not turn up in the menu
it appears it only installs the keys for the server
but it runs in command line?
nope
in terminal cinerella?
did you install it from synaptic?
according to the instructions it should be available for 9.04: http://cinelerra.org/getting_cinelerra.php#jaunty
I do not see any cinelerra packages in the Synaptic package manager either
so you didnt install it from synaptic?
have you enabled the universe/multiverse repos?
universe i believe
indues: I used the link http://akirad.cinelerra.org/pool/addakirad.deb
also tried the command line on the webpage
the one starting with wget
slart: they do not turn up
slart: I added "deb http://akirad.cinelerra.org akirad-jaunty main"
slart: http://paste.ubuntu.com/235069/
!pastebinit
slart: http://paste.ubuntu.com/235072/
try this http://akirad.cinelerra.org/pool/addakirad.deb
but best is use the PPA u have
make sure its the PPA for 9.04
